Skandal u Italiji: Baloteli zbog rasističkih povika napucao loptu u publiku (VIDEO)
Italija se srami zbog događaja na Bentegodiju

03 Nov 2019

Veliki skandal uzdrmao je Apenine ovog popodneva. U prvom planu je bio Mario Baloteli i Veronina publika, koja je poznata po sličnim ispadima tokom istorije. Temperamentni Baloteli je tokom čitavog meča trpeo uvrede na rasnoj osnovi, a onda mu je prekipelo na početku drugog poluvremena, posle čega je čak i otišao sa terena.
Igrao se 54. minut, bivši reprezentativac Italije je bio kod korner zastavice, a onda je u jeku povika uzeo loptu i napucao je prema najvatrenijim pristalicama domaćeg tima. Čitav kolaps trajao je nekoliko minuta, Baloteli se posle višeminutnog prekida ipak vratio i na kraju postigao izuzetan pogodak u 85. minutu. Ipak, tada je uspeo samo da ublaži poraz svog tima, ali je rezultat ostao u potpunosti u drugom planu.
Verona je povela četiti minuta ranije golom Salseda More, a sve je bilo rešeno u 81. minutu, kada je prednost duplirao Pesina u 81. minutu. Balotelijev pogodak je samo na kratko podigao potpuno utučenu Brešu.



Inače, Baloteli je danas popodne i pretio da bi mogao da napravi ovakav potez ukoliko se ovako nešto bude dešavalo. Kada je napucao loptu, prvo se našao na udaru protivničkih igrača, a onda su njegovi saigrači nekoliko minuta pokušavali da ga smire. U tim trenucima, spiker je upozoravao da će utakmica biti i definitivno prekinuta, ukoliko se ovakvi ispadi publike budu nastavili.
Vodeći ljudi italijanskog fudbala usvojili su noviu protokol, u kojem će se oštro suprotstaviti svakom vidu diskriminacije. Dako je prekinut i meč između Rome i Napolija, pošto su domaći navijači vršili "teritorijalnu diskriminaciju" nad Napolitancima. Posle toga je Edin Džeko zamolio publiku na Olimpiku da bodri samo svoj tim.
Udineze je u najvažnijem trenutku prekinuo niz poraza, pošto je slavio u Đenovi posle preokreta sa 3:1. Pandev je doveo domaćina golom u 22. minnutu, ali su se Zebre vratile u pravom trenutku efektnim pogotkom De Paula. Za potpuni preokret bio je odgobvoran Sema u 87. minutu, dok je konačan rezultat postavio Lazanja u trećem minutu nadoknade.
Velika uzbuđenja, u meču bez pobednika, viđena su u Lećeu. Domaćin je vodio u dva navrata protiv Sasuola, prvo golom Lapadule, a potom i Falka iz slobodnog udarca. Ipak, Sasuolo se prvi vratio golom Falka, a onda je Berardi postavio konačan rezultat meča.

Scandal in Italy: Balotelli shoots ball at audience for racist shouting (VIDEO)
Italy is ashamed of the events at Bentegodi

03 Nov 2019

A major scandal rocked the Apennines this afternoon. In the foreground was Mario Baloteli and Verona's audience, which is known for similar outbursts throughout history. Temperamentous Balotelli suffered racial slurs throughout the match and then got over it at the start of the second half, after which he even left the field.
The 54th minute was played, the former Italian national team was at the corner of the flag, and then in the cry of shouting he took the ball and attacked it towards the warmest supporters of the home team. The whole collapse lasted for a few minutes, Baloteli returned after several minutes of interruption and finally scored an extraordinary goal in the 85th minute. Yet, at the time, he only managed to cushion his team’s defeat, but the result remained entirely in the background.
Verona took the lead four minutes early with a goal from Salsed More, all settled in the 81st minute, when the advantage doubled Pesin in the 81st minute. Balotelli's shot only briefly lifted Beta completely overwhelmed.



By the way, Baloteli threatened this afternoon that he could make such a move if something like this happened. When he shot the ball, he first found himself hitting the opposing players and then his teammates tried for a few minutes to calm him down. In those moments, the announcer warned that the match would be definitely discontinued if such audience outbursts continued.
The leading men of Italian football have adopted a new protocol, in which they will sharply oppose any form of discrimination. The match between Rome and Napoli was also interrupted, as local supporters were "territorially discriminating" against Napolitans. Afterwards, Edin Dzeko asked the audience at the Olympics to cheer only his team.
Udinese have interrupted a series of defeats at the most important moment, as they celebrated in Genoa after a 3-1 draw. Pandev led the home side with a goal in the 22nd minute, but the Zebra returned at the right moment with a spectacular shot by De Paul. For a complete turnaround, Sam was dismissed in the 87th minute, while the final score set Lazan in the third minute of the draw.
Great excitement, in the match without a winner, was seen in Lentz. The hosts led on two occasions against Sasuol, first with a goal from Lapadula and then Falk from a free kick. Still, Sasuolo came back first with a goal from Falk, and then Berardi set up the final score of the match.
